decisions.context: Shift from Maria who was previously stretched; seen as good onboarding and test for Pratik who has relevant experience in building and optimizing funnels

decisions.what: Use six-week cadence for program initiatives
decisions.context: To maintain impetus and provide sense of delivered achievement for engineering teams, avoiding feeling of 'consistent slog'

decisions.what: Focus on dependable channels (Meta native or search) for tracking 25% CVR uplift
decisions.context: Difficulty in tracking blended number due to varying channel performance across direct sales and app

decisions.what: Structure as one-year program with multiple time-boxed initiatives
decisions.context: Not a three-month effort; aimed at achieving 2026 OKRs with monthly ramp and goals aligned to OKR target

decisions.what: Implement 25-30 initiatives across six pillars: quiz, price and offer testing, landing pages, post-quiz, program ops, and RAPH
decisions.context: Initial list for conversion rate program to achieve 25% year-on-year CVR improvement

Excitement about Pratik taking on conversion rate program as onboarding opportunity
